channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Identity Management (REST Interface)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Identity Management (REST Interface)

item.title: CVE-2019-0301|2024-08-04T17:44:16.388Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20identity%20management%20%28rest%20interface%29
item.description: Under certain conditions, it is possible to request the modification of role or privilege assignments through SAP Identity Management REST Interface Version 2, which would otherwise be restricted only for viewing.
